target.description: Evaluate complementary probability for different scenarios related to dice rolling.
target.name: evaluate_complementary_probability

target.description: Calculate the arrangements of distinct items considering duplicates.
target.name: calculate_arrangements

target.description: Calculate factorial of a non-negative integer.
target.name: calculate_factorial

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def calculate_complementary_probability(favorable_outcomes, total_outcomes, trials=1):
    if trials <= 0:
        return 'Invalid number of trials'
    single_event_probability = Rational(favorable_outcomes, total_outcomes)
    prob_all_different = single_event_probability ** trials
    return 1 - prob_all_different
target.description: Calculate complementary probability for given favorable and total outcomes across specified trials.
target.name: calculate_complementary_probability

target.code:
from sympy import Rational

def expected_dice_rolls(days, target_number):
    roll_probability = Rational(1, 6)  # Chance of rolling a specific number
    expected_rolls = days * (1 + (1 - roll_probability) * (1/(1 - 1/6)))  # Adjust for rerolls if targeting specific numbers
    return expected_rolls
target.description: Calculate the expected number of times a die will be rolled given certain conditions.
target.name: expected_dice_rolls

target.description: Calculate the total expected number of times Bob will roll his die in a non-leap year based on daily expected rolls.
target.name: expected_dice_rolls_per_year
